ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.routingpolicies.v1alpha1.C.description: CommunitySet is the Schema for the communitysets API

spec.description: CommunitySetSpec defines the desired state of CommunitySet

expressionMatch.description: Options that determine the matching criteria that applies to the list of community members.
expressionMatch.title: Expression Match

members.description: A standard BGP community value, regular expression or well-known name or else a large BGP community value or regular expression.
members.title: Community Set Members

spec.title: Specification

status.description: CommunitySetStatus defines the observed state of CommunitySet
status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.routingpolicies.v1alpha1.C.description: CommunitySetList is a list of communitysets

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

com.nokia.eda.routingpolicies.v1alpha1.P.description: Policy is the Schema for the policys API

spec.description: Policy defines a set of rules and actions to manage network traffic or routing behavior, with statements that include matching conditions and actions, such as accepting or rejecting routes, or modifying route attributes like BGP parameters.

defaultAction.description: The default action to apply if no other actions are defined.

bgp.description: Actions related to the BGP protocol.

asPathPrepend.description: AS number to prepend to the AS Path attributes.
asPathPrepend.title: AS Path Prepend

asPathRemove.description: Clear the AS path to make it empty.
asPathRemove.title: AS Path Remove

asPathReplace.description: Replace the existing AS path with a new AS_SEQUENCE containing the listed AS numbers.
asPathReplace.title: AS Path Replace

localPreference.description: Set a new LOCAL_PREF value for matching BGP routes.
localPreference.title: Set Local Preference

setOrigin.description: Set a new ORIGIN attribute for matching BGP routes.
setOrigin.title: Set Origin

bgp.title: BGP

defaultAction.title: Default Action

action.description: Actions for routes that match the policy statement.

bgp.description: Actions related to the BGP protocol.

setOrigin.description: Set a new ORIGIN attribute for matching BGP routes.
setOrigin.title: Set Origin

action.title: Action

match.description: Match conditions of the policy statement.

bgp.description: Configuration for BGP-specific policy match criteria.

evpnRouteType.description: Match conditions for EVPN route types.
evpnRouteType.title: EVPN Route Type

bgp.title: BGP

family.description: Address families that the route belongs to.
family.title: Family

protocol.description: The route protocol type to match.
protocol.title: Protocol

match.title: Match

spec.title: Specification

status.description: PolicyStatus defines the observed state of Policy.
status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.routingpolicies.v1alpha1.P.description: PrefixSet is the Schema for the prefixsets API

spec.description: PrefixSet defines a collection of IP prefixes, which may include specific CIDR blocks or a range of prefixes. This set is typically used for matching routes or implementing routing policies.

prefix.description: List of IPv4 or IPv6 prefixes in CIDR notation.

endRange.description: The end range when using a range to match prefixes.
endRange.title: End Range

exact.description: Indicates if it is an exact match. Ignores the StartRange and EndRange if this param is set.
exact.title: Exact

prefix.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 prefix in CIDR notation with mask.
prefix.title: Prefix

startRange.description: If specifying a range, this is the start of the range.
startRange.title: Start Range

prefix.title: Prefixes

spec.title: Specification

status.description: PrefixSetStatus defines the observed state of PrefixSet.
status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.routingpolicies.v1alpha1.P.description: PrefixSetList is a list of prefixsets

is asked for.
